Run multiple NMA

Source: vignettes/run_multiple_nma.Rmd
run_multiple_nma.Rmd

Introduction

This document describes how to use the main functions of NMA to run multiple network meta-analysis at once.

Example 

library(NMA)
library(dplyr)
library(BRugs)
library(purrr)

Settings

Define the BUGS parameters for MCMC.

bugs_params <-
  list(
    PROG = "openBugs",
    N.BURNIN = 10,#00,
    N.SIMS = 150,#0,
    N.CHAINS = 2,
    N.THIN = 1,
    PAUSE = TRUE)
